alert.note: Alert for Warren (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 7:27PM EDT until August 07 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Warren County in northwestern New Jersey... Northeastern Lehigh County in eastern Pennsylvania... Eastern Carbon County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Monroe County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Northampton County in eastern Pennsylvania... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 727 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lake Harmony to Kunkletown to near Lehigh University, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Allentown, Easton, Mount Pocono, Bethlehem, Forks, Northampton, East Stroudsburg, Tobyhanna, Wilson, Washington, Blairstown, Nazareth, Palmerton, Bangor, Slatington, Pen Argyl, Wind Gap, Bath, Belvidere and Harmony. This includes the following highways... Northeast Extension between mile markers 57 and 72, and between mile markers 74 and 92. Interstate 78 in Pennsylvania near mile marker 54. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 282 and 314. Interstate 80 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 14. Interstate 380 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 9. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for northwestern New Jersey...and eastern and northeastern Pennsylvania. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for northwestern New Jersey...and eastern and northeastern Pennsylvania.
